[!exec:lotus] skip 'dealbot integration tests need `lotus` to run'
[!exec:lotus-seed] skip 'dealbot integration tests need `lotus-seed` to run'
[!exec:lotus-miner] skip 'dealbot integration tests need `lotus-miner` to run'

devnet &

exec sleep 20

env TOKEN=`cat ~/.devLotus/token`
env API=`cat ~/.devLotus/api`
env DATADIR=/tmp
env MINER=t01000

exec dealbot --api $TOKEN:$API storage-deal --data-dir $DATADIR --miner $MINER
